name: Mercury sulfide
desc: Mercury sulfide, mercuric sulfide, mercury sulphide, or mercury(II) sulfide is a chemical compound composed of the chemical elements mercury and sulfur. It is represented by the chemical formula HgS. It is virtually insoluble in water.
EU classification (DSD) (outdated):
Very toxic (T+)
Dangerous for the environment (N)
Other anions:
Mercury oxide
Mercury selenide
Mercury telluride
